DOC.brief_title: Trial Provider-to-Patient Interactive Voice Response ( IVR ) Calls Improve Weight Management Community Health Centers ( CHCs )
DOC.detailed_description: We randomize provider three group . Patients whose provider randomize usual care receive IVR call available guideline-level weight management service TCL . Groups one two receive pre-visit post-referral call . The pre-visit call invite patient want discuss weight upcoming visit provider remember . The post-referral call remind patient receive referral encourage schedule visit community base weight intervention program . Patients whose provider randomize group 1 receive IVR call use schedule refer provider 's voice . Group 2 receive IVR call use standard IVR voice .
